ygData.subject: RE: Re: SK Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@resgen.com] Sent: September 23, 1999 9:14 AM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Re: SK Items From: Chip
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: September 23, 1999 9:14 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Re: SK Items


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>


What about a lifetap effect? Or maybe some DD/DOT effect?
On a side note, if the engine permits it, an aura of darkness
would be the coolest thing in the game, I'm envious of the cool
visuals on Soulfire, but an aura of darkness would be even cooler.

I'd also like to see this quest be fairly involved, which would be
hard to do for both Humans and DEs. And to the SKs out there,
please don't post a walkthrough like what happened with Soulfire.
That's just lame.

Xilith

Whatever happens, this weapon needs to look cool (well perhaps not cool, but
different =))
And it needs an effect like the ones mentioned above.
Also it won't be much of an anti-ghoulbane if it doesn't have at least the
same damage =)

Just my thoughts....

-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
